pages.text: $(italic)Your tools with this enchantment seem to dissolve all things they touch into thin air. Broken down into the finest sand in no time at all and blown away by the wind.$(br2)For this one time, however, when you want to knock half a city out of the rough stone, it might even come in handy. Some things are probably curse and blessing at the same time.
$(br3)Destroys the drops of all broken blocks.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools.
